speaker: Elena
text: Did you see the new feedback that came in from the beta users?
ipa: dɪd juː siː ðə njuː ˈfiːdbæk ðæt keɪm ɪn frəm ðə ˈbeɪtə ˈjuːzəz?

speaker: James
text: Yeah, especially the one which mentioned the settings panel that disappears too quickly.
ipa: jæ, ɪˈspɛʃəli ðə wʌn wɪʧ ˈmɛnʃənd ðə ˈsɛtɪŋz ˈpænəl ðæt ˌdɪsəˈpɪəz tuː ˈkwɪkli.

speaker: Elena
text: That’s the behavior which confused a lot of testers during onboarding.
ipa: ðæts ðə bɪˈheɪvjə wɪʧ kənˈfjuːzd ə lɒt əv ˈtɛstəz ˈdjʊərɪŋ ˈɒnbɔːdɪŋ.

speaker: James
text: I spoke to the user who originally reported it. She's a project manager whose team uses the dashboard every day.
ipa: aɪ spəʊk tuː ðə ˈjuːzə huː əˈrɪʤɪnəli rɪˈpɔːtɪd ɪt. ʃiːz ə ˈprɒʤɛkt ˈmænɪʤə huːz tiːm ˈjuːzɪz ðə ˈdæʃbɔːd ˈɛvri deɪ.

speaker: Elena
text: Did she explain the moment when it usually happens?
ipa: dɪd ʃiː ɪksˈpleɪn ðə ˈməʊmənt wen ɪt ˈjuːʒuəli ˈhæpənz?

speaker: James
text: Yes — right after completing the form that updates their team’s profile.
ipa: jɛs — raɪt ˈɑːftə kəmˈpliːtɪŋ ðə fɔːm ðæt ˈʌpdeɪts ðeə tiːmz ˈprəʊfaɪl.

speaker: Elena
text: Okay. That helps. We also had a tester who recorded a session which clearly shows the bug.
ipa: ˈəʊkeɪ. ðæt hɛlps. wiː ˈɔːlsəʊ hæd ə ˈtɛstə huː rɪˈkɔːdɪd ə ˈsɛʃən wɪʧ ˈklɪəli ʃəʊz ðə bʌɡ.

speaker: James
text: Perfect. I’ll send that to the engineer who owns that component.
ipa: ˈpɜːfɪkt. aɪl sɛnd ðæt tuː ði ˌɛnʤɪˈnɪə huː əʊnz ðæt kəmˈpəʊnənt.

speaker: Elena
text: And maybe we can improve the help tooltip that shows up when users get stuck.
ipa: ənd ˈmeɪbi wiː kən ɪmˈpruːv ðə hɛlp ˈtuːltɪp ðæt ʃəʊz ʌp wen ˈjuːzəz ɡɛt stʌk.

speaker: James
text: Agreed. Let's also link to the onboarding guide which we updated last week.
ipa: əˈɡriːd. lɛts ˈɔːlsəʊ lɪŋk tuː ði ˈɒnbɔːdɪŋ ɡaɪd wɪʧ wiː ʌpˈdeɪtɪd lɑːst wiːk.

speaker: Elena
text: The one that includes the accessibility improvements?
ipa: ðə wʌn ðæt ɪnˈkluːdz ði əkˌsɛsəˈbɪləti ɪmˈpruːvmənts?

speaker: James
text: Exactly — the guide which covers keyboard navigation and screen reader support.
ipa: ɪɡˈzæktli — ðə ɡaɪd wɪʧ ˈkʌvəz ˈkiːbɔːd ˌnævɪˈɡeɪʃən ənd skriːn ˈriːdə səˈpɔːt.
